mods.abstract: REWARD--The subscriber will pay $20 reward for the apprehension and delivery of his negress ADELLE at the Third Municipality Jail, or $50 for her delivery at the same place, if proven that she was harbored by any responsible person. Said negress is about 29 years old, about 5 feet 3 inches high, a dark griffe, and looks down and confused when spoken to. She is a cre-ole of this place, and speaks both languages. The above re-ward will be paid on said delivery, on supplication to Mr. Barran, No. 117 Casacalco street, Third Municipality. JOHN DIAMOND. ap12 3t
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

Physical rights are retained by the LSU Libraries. Copyright has expired and the item is therefore in the public domain. Permission to reproduce this image must be requested through the Special Collections Department, Louisiana State University Libraries.
mods.note: Louisiana Runaway Slave Advertisements, 1836-1865, Louisiana Digital Library, Baton Rouge, La.
